question: A electrician works for 5 weeks every month and for 6 days every week. If he gets paid $180 every day, how much does he earn if he works for a year?
answer:
The electrician works for 6 days every week and works for 5 weeks every month so he works for 6 days/week * 5 weeks/month = <<6*5=30>>30 days/month
If he earns $180 every day he then earns $180/day * 30 days/month = $<<180*30=5400>>5400/month
A year is equal to 12 months so every year he earns $5400/month * 12 months/year = $<<5400*12=64,800>>64,800
#### 64,800
